keywords.value: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: So-called fintech companies, which take deposits, make electronic payments or lend money, will be able to apply for bank charters from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.
snippet: So-called fintech companies, which take deposits, make electronic payments or lend money, will be able to apply for bank charters from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency....

headline.main: Financial Technology Start-Ups to Get a License to Bank
headline.print_headline: Fintech Start-Ups to Get Access to Bank Charters
